## StreamController.start() method

Starts the stream connection with an optional request payload.

**Signature:**

```typescript
start(request?: TRequest): void;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

If called while the stream is already active, the call may be ignored.
